## An aligned multi-row equation

$$
\begin{align}
x &= \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} \\
  &= \frac{-b + \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} \quad \text{(Positive root)} \\
  &= \frac{-b - \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a} \quad \text{(Negative root)}.
\end{align}
$$

